# PED::GET_PED_PARACHUTE_TINT_INDEX

## Summary
Allows script to control the tint index of the parachute

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT\*** tint

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This function gets the tint index of the parachute for the ped
